body:
For example, run `tctl admin shard d --shard_id 0` will result in below metrics:
service_error_with_type{error_type="serviceerror_InvalidArgument",namespace="_unknown_",operation="Unknown",service_name="frontend"} 2

The namespace _unknown_ is expected as the request does not contain a namespace filed. But the operation should be "AdminGetShard".
title: Metrics for Operator API or Admin API has operation=Unknown
